thread.title: Disney adds ferryboat event with desserts, drinks
thread.title_full: Disney adds ferryboat event with desserts, drinks

author: Dewayne Bevil
title: Disney adds ferryboat event with desserts, drinks
text:
0 
Also onboard: specialty alcoholic and nonalcoholic beverages in glow glasses. 
The events take place on one of the famed Disney ferryboats that carry passengers from the Ticket & Transportation Center to the Magic Kingdom theme park. The cruise will sail from the TTC side. The soundtrack for the pyrotechniques will be broadcast aboard the cruise. 
On select nights, the fireworks presentation will be Happy HalloWishes (tied to Mickey's Not So Scary Halloween Party) or Holiday Wishes (tied to Mickey's Very Merry Christmas Party). 
Ferrytale Cruises are limited to 150 passengers apiece. Tickets are $99 ($69 for ages 3-9), and reservations are encouraged. 
For more information and reservations, go to disneyworld.com/dine or call 407-939-3463.
